description: Demonstrates the Generative UI system that automatically creates contextually-appropriate UIs based on the question being asked. Tests confirmation, choice, rating, and text input UI types.

phases.name: test_confirmation
phases.instructions: Ask the human a yes/no confirmation question using ask_human. For example: 'Should I proceed with the analysis?' The system should automatically generate a confirmation UI with Yes/No buttons.

phases.name: test_choice
phases.instructions:
The human responded: {{ state.test_confirmation }}

Now ask the human to pick between options using ask_human. For example: 'Which format would you prefer: JSON, XML, or YAML?' The system should automatically generate a choice UI with radio buttons.

phases.name: test_rating
phases.instructions:
The human chose: {{ state.test_choice }}

Now ask the human for a rating using ask_human. For example: 'How would you rate this experience on a scale of 1-5?' The system should automatically generate a rating UI with stars.

phases.name: test_text
phases.instructions:
The human rated: {{ state.test_rating }}

Now ask the human an open-ended question using ask_human. For example: 'What additional feedback do you have?' The system should automatically generate a text input UI.

phases.name: summary
